ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.10'

about.description:
This library provides a pure Python, asynchronous interface for the Telegram
Bot API. It's compatible with Python versions 3.7+.
In addition to the pure API implementation, this library features a number of
high-level classes to make the development of bots easy and straightforward.
These classes are contained in the telegram.ext submodule.  doc_url: https://python-telegram-bot.readthedocs.io/en/stable/
about.summary: We have made you a wrapper you can't refuse

about.description:
This library provides a pure Python, asynchronous interface for the Telegram
Bot API. It's compatible with Python versions 3.7+.
In addition to the pure API implementation, this library features a number of
high-level classes to make the development of bots easy and straightforward.
These classes are contained in the telegram.ext submodule.  doc_url: https://python-telegram-bot.readthedocs.io/en/stable/
about.summary: We have made you a wrapper you can't refuse

name: python-telegram-bot
raw_meta_yaml:
schema_version: 1

context:
  name: python-telegram-bot
  version: 22.6

package:
  name: ${{ name|lower }}
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/${{ name[0] }}/${{ name }}/${{ name | replace('-', '_') }}-${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 50ae8cc10f8dff01445628687951020721f37956966b92a91df4c1bf2d113742

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: python
  script: ${{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps --ignore-installed --no-cache-dir -vvv

requirements:
  host:
    - python ${{ python_min }}.*
    - hatchling
    - pip
  run:
    - python >=${{ python_min }}
    - httpx >=0.27,<0.29
    # for py >=3.14 but want to stay noarch: python
    - httpcore >=1.0.9

tests:
  - python:
      imports:
        - telegram
      pip_check: true
      python_version: ${{ python_min }}.*

about:
  license: LGPL-3.0-only AND GPL-3.0-only
  license_file:
    - LICENSE
    - LICENSE.dual
    - LICENSE.lesser
  summary: We have made you a wrapper you can't refuse
  description: |
    This library provides a pure Python, asynchronous interface for the Telegram
    Bot API. It's compatible with Python versions 3.7+.
    In addition to the pure API implementation, this library features a number of
    high-level classes to make the development of bots easy and straightforward.
    These classes are contained in the telegram.ext submodule.  doc_url: https://python-telegram-bot.readthedocs.io/en/stable/
  homepage: https://python-telegram-bot.org/
  repository: https://github.com/python-telegram-bot/python-telegram-bot

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - xylar
    - mdraw
